comments.content: Reminds me of [Home Run Script Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829130359/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run) by Doyald Young but that's obviously not it... I like also [Corner Store](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829130359/http:/marketplace.veer.com/font/Corner-Store-JBT0000111) and [Dream Lover](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829130359/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeart/dream-lover).
